anime.name: Messenger from the Sea
anime.info: A humanoid monkey wrapped in bandages named Non-chan, sees a turtle being picked on at the beach. He runs up to save it, but the bullies flee thinking he is a mummy. The turtle thanks him for saving his life, and asks if he wants to go with him to leave this country that is so full of bullies. He says he'll wait for Non-chan until tomorrow. The next day leaves for the beach to find something most unexpected.
『海からの使者』 公式サイト
anime.news: <cite>Princess Resurrection, Messenger from the Sea, Moteki</cite> Promos Streamed
